Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 35th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Kyle Pantoja (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2015, off Val Chacko (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/12/2016 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2017, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Injured on 8/22/2018 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2019, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 5/30/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
